comment: She is super bubbly and talkative which can be annoying but she is also very caring and constantly reaches out to ensure success. The classwork was super easy and there were no tests. The biggest grade was the field experience but if you do everything its an easy A.

I took a hybrid course, the online portion was lots of work but all assignments were easy. The in class portion was pretty much just show up and talk. There is a School observation in this class meaning you go to another school and observe for a grade.
